right.text: i imagine serge is sliding the barrel of a gun into his fat gaping maw right now, thinking "fuck you adrian.. fuck you all.. you'll never call me fat.. again......"

left.text: if i had known you were so sensitive about being such a huge fatass, we probably wouldn't have said anything

right.text: fat splatters onto the wall behind him
a pack of stray kittens enters the room, and eats his remains. one day those kittens will have to be put down by the city, and for what. is for nothing.

left.text: some even got on the mayor
